root.script: a=abs(-5)+2 b=abs(-5)+1 from jinja2 import Template template = Template('Hello! {{ a }} + {{ b }} == {{ a + b }}') c = template.render(a=a, b=b) d = Template("hello ${data}!").render(data="world")

print d url = 'http://www.SINA.com.cn/' print escape(url) print unescape(url) print lower(url) print upper(url) content = " df dd \r\n" print content print trim(content) print title(content) print capitalize(trim(content))
